Topic.Title: Looking for a game with a time as the title.

Posts.EditableText:
I remember a while back I was browsing Youtube, when I found a text-based game where the title was a time (like, The Death - Than Trung). Does anyone know what exactly it was called? Thanks!

-Saigontourism
